sentences.sContent: Catherine wasn’t sure the book was the right one, but she bought it anyway.
sentences.sCn: 凯瑟琳不能确定就是这本书，但她还是买了。

sentences.sContent: This idea probably won’t work, but let’s try it anyway.
sentences.sCn: 这个办法可能行不通，不过我们还是试试吧。

synos.tran: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

words.tran: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样

trans.tranCn: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之
trans.tranOther: in spite of the fact that you have just mentioned
